name: Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage and Roasted Root Veggies
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: Smoked sausage and mixed root veggies are roasted in one pan and served with a tangy Greek yogurt sauce to make this easy weeknight meal.
ingredients: 12 ounces sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
3 ounces new potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
3 ounces beets, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
3 ounces parsnips, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
3 ounces carrots, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage
directions: In a shallow baking pan, place sweet potatoes, new potatoes, beets, parsnips, carrots, and shallots
Drizzle with oil and toss to coat
Arrange vegetables in a single layer
Cut sausage into 3 portions, then halve each portion lengthwise
Stir vegetables and push to one side of the pan
Place sausage, cut side down, on other side of the pan
Roast for 10 minutes more or until sausage begins to brown and vegetables are tender
Season with rosemary, salt, and pepper
For sauce, stir together the yogurt, mayonnaise, horseradish, and Worcestershire
Serve sausage and vegetables with sauce
